strike.unclear: To the Sheriff of Walla Walla Co Jail

p: Application at Chambers for writ of Habeas Corpus Decr 31 1866

And now this day the Plaintiff appearing before me & presents a sworn petitione states that his daughter Louisa Jane Derrick aged fourteen years is now at the house of Mrs Whitesides the Defendant & that his said daughter is kept from him by the acts and doings of the said defendent Mrs Whitesides so that he cannot have have the care and Custody of his said daughter now therefore this is to command and require that you Mrs. Whitesides produce June at the Court House in Walla Walla city on Wednesday the 2 day
of Jany AD 1867 at the hour of 110 AM the said Louisa Jane Derrick. To the end that such orders may be made tendering the care and Custody of said Louisa Jane Derrick as may be considered proper & this writ you on her manner disregard and it is ordered that the Sheriff of Walla Walla Co. forthwith serve this writ on the delievers and make due return as required by law
